source: Incremental source data in CSV file on Azure data lake storage

from azure.storage.blob import BlobClient
import pandas as pd
from io import StringIO

sas_url = "https://adls4fsoetlhubdevuseast.blob.core.windows.net/project/project_siv_data.csv?sv=2020-10-02&st=2022-05-11T09%3A48%3A28Z&se=2022-05-12T09%3A48%3A28Z&sr=b&sp=r&sig=JhdSw1F%2BODRA4%2B5nko0YwY8RGyjUjbuyA4ms2GblpeE%3D"

blob_client = BlobClient.from_blob_url(sas_url)
blob_data = blob_client.download_blob()
df = pd.read_csv(StringIO(blob_data.content_as_text()))
#print(df)
sparkDF=spark.createDataFrame(df) 

sparkDF.createOrReplaceTempView('customer_df')
#sparkDF.show()
Existing Data in SQL DB table

user = "sqladminuser"
password  = "try2find$5"

jdbcDF = spark.read.format("jdbc") \
    .option("url", "jdbc:sqlserver://sqlserver-kyn-001494-dev-eus-001.database.windows.net:1433;databaseName={sqldb-etlhub-confirmed}") \
    .option("query", "SELECT tgt.* FROM DBXDH.DHT_PROJECT_PYSPARK as tgt WHERE CURRENT_IND='Y'") \
    .option("user", user) \
    .option("password", password) \
    .option("driver", "com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.SQLServerDriver") \
    .load()
#jdbcDF.show()
jdbcDF.createOrReplaceTempView('jdbcDF')
Full Outer Join to identify New, Changed, Deleted rows and the ones no longer active in source

fullJoin=sparkDF.join(jdbcDF,sparkDF.PROJECT_ID == jdbcDF.PROJECT_ID, "fullouter") 
fullJoin.createOrReplaceTempView('fullJoin')
Conditional split: New, Changed, Deleted records and no longer active in source
fullJoin.spark

emp = [(1,"Smith",-1,"2018","10","M",3000), \
    (2,"Rose",1,"2010","20","M",4000), \
    (3,"Williams",1,"2010","10","M",1000), \
    (4,"Jones",2,"2005","10","F",2000), \
    (5,"Brown",2,"2010","40","",-1), \
      (6,"Brown",2,"2010","50","",-1) \
  ]
empColumns = ["emp_id","name","superior_emp_id","year_joined", \
       "emp_dept_id","gender","salary"]

empDF = spark.createDataFrame(data=emp, schema = empColumns)
empDF.printSchema()
empDF.show(truncate=False)

dept = [("Finance",10), \
    ("Marketing",20), \
    ("Sales",30), \
    ("IT",40) \
  ]
deptColumns = ["dept_name","dept_id"]
deptDF = spark.createDataFrame(data=dept, schema = deptColumns)
deptDF.printSchema()
deptDF.show(truncate=False)
empDF.join(deptDF,empDF.emp_dept_id ==  deptDF.dept_id,"inner") \
.show(truncate=False)

empDF.join(deptDF,empDF.emp_dept_id ==  deptDF.dept_id,"outer") \
    .show(truncate=False)
empDF.join(deptDF,empDF.emp_dept_id ==  deptDF.dept_id,"full") \
    .show(truncate=False)
empDF.join(deptDF,empDF.emp_dept_id ==  deptDF.dept_id,"fullouter") \
    .show(truncate=False)

for i in sell_cycleDF.columns:
    col_list.append(i)
    #print (col_list)
sell_cyclenkDF = sell_cycleDF.withColumn("nk_hash",md5("SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_CODE"))

sell_cyclecolhashDF.createOrReplaceTempView("sellcyclesrc")
Final Code SCD Type2

from azure.storage.blob import BlobClient
import pandas as pd
from io import StringIO
from pyspark.sql.functions import md5, concat_ws
from sqlite3 import connect
from pyspark.sql import functions as F
conn = connect(':memory:')
natural_key="CUSTOMER_NO"
columns = ["FINANCIAL_COUNTRY_CD","CUSTOMER_DESC","GBG_ID"]
sas_url = "https://adls4fsoetlhubdevuseast.blob.core.windows.net/customer/customer_data.csv?sv=2020-10-02&st=2022-05-15T14%3A59%3A08Z&se=2023-05-16T14%3A59%3A00Z&sr=b&sp=r&sig=RYE103C28iVzI4%2BTmiDyMqJhGGNqBooxZgUc4LITF4U%3D"
blob_client = BlobClient.from_blob_url(sas_url)
blob_data = blob_client.download_blob()
incrementalData = pd.read_csv(StringIO(blob_data.content_as_text()))
#print(df)
incrementalData_DF=spark.createDataFrame(incrementalData)
col_list=[]
for i in incrementalData_DF.columns:
    col_list.append(i)
    #print (col_list)
incrementalData_DF1 = incrementalData_DF.withColumn("nk_hash",md5(natural_key))
incrementalData_DF2 = incrementalData_DF1.withColumn("column_hash", md5(concat_ws("", *col_list)))
#sell_cyclecolhashDF.show()
incrementalData_DF2.createOrReplaceTempView("incrementalData_DF2")


#insertsellcycle=pd.read_sql("select a.SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_CODE,a.SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_NAME,a.SSM_STEP_NO,a.SSM_STEP_NAME from sellcyclesrc a left join  sellcycletgt b on a.nk_hash = b.existing_nk_hash where b.existing_nk_hash is null",conn)
#insertsellcycledf=spark.createDataFrame(insertsellcycle)
#insertsellcycledf.show()
#%%sql
#select * from sellcyclesrc


existingDataDF = spark.read.format("jdbc") \
    .option("url", f"jdbc:sqlserver://sqlserver-kyn-001494-dev-eus-001.database.windows.net:1433;databaseName=sqldb-etlhub-confirmed;") \
    .option("query", "SELECT MAX(CUSTOMER_KEY) OVER (ORDER BY CUSTOMER_KEY  ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING ) AS MAX_KEY, LOWER(CONVERT(VARCHAR(32),HashBytes('MD5', CUSTOMER_NO),2)) as existing_nk_hash,tgt.* FROM DBXDH.DHT_CUSTOMER1 as tgt WHERE CURRENT_IND='Y'") \
    .option("user", "sqladminuser") \
    .option("password", "try2find$5") \
    .option("driver", "com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.SQLServerDriver") \
    .load()
#existingDataDF1 = existingDataDF.select([F.col(c).alias("`"'existing_'+c+"`") for c in existingDataDF.columns])
existingDataDF1 = existingDataDF.select([F.col(c).alias('existing_'+c) for c in existingDataDF.columns])
#existingDataDF1.printSchema()
existingDataDF1.createOrReplaceTempView('existingDataDF')

fullJoin1=incrementalData_DF2.join(existingDataDF1,incrementalData_DF2.CUSTOMER_NO == existingDataDF1.existing_CUSTOMER_KEY, "fullouter") 
fullJoin1.createOrReplaceTempView('fullJoin')
%%sql
select * from existingDataDF

%%sql
--INSERTS OR NEW ROWS
--INSERT INTO DBXDH.DHT_CUSTOMER1
select COALESCE(existing_MAX_KEY,0) + ROW_NUMBER () OVER (ORDER BY 1) AS CUSTOMER_KEY1,1 as VERSION ,
CUSTOMER_NO,FINANCIAL_COUNTRY_CD,GBG_ID,CUSTOMER_NAME,'Y' AS CURRENT_IND, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS EXTRACT_DT,
CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS REC_START_DT, '9999-12-31 00:00:00.000' as REC_END_DT, 'ESA' AS SOURCE_SYSTEM, column_hash as REC_CHECKSUM,
'I' as REC_STATUS,current_timestamp as IMG_LST_UPD_DT, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IMG_CREATED_DT, 'LG' AS DATA_IND,
'Y' AS ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND
from fullJoin A WHERE existing_existing_nk_hash is null;

fullJoin1.write \
        .format("jdbc") \
        .option("url", f"jdbc:sqlserver://sqlserver-kyn-001494-dev-eus-001.database.windows.net:1433;databaseName=sqldb-etlhub-confirmed;") \
        .option("query", "INSERT INTO DBXDH.DHT_CUSTOMER1 \
        select COALESCE(existing_MAX_KEY,0) + ROW_NUMBER () OVER (ORDER BY 1) AS CUSTOMER_KEY1,1 as VERSION , \
        CUSTOMER_NO,FINANCIAL_COUNTRY_CD,GBG_ID,CUSTOMER_NAME,'Y' AS CURRENT_IND, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS EXTRACT_DT, \
        CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS REC_START_DT, '9999-12-31 00:00:00.000' as REC_END_DT, 'ESA' AS SOURCE_SYSTEM, column_hash as REC_CHECKSUM, \
        'I' as REC_STATUS,current_timestamp as IMG_LST_UPD_DT, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IMG_CREATED_DT, 'LG' AS DATA_IND, \
        'Y' AS ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND \
        from fullJoin A WHERE existing_existing_nk_hash is null") \
        .option("user", "sqladminuser") \
        .option("password", "try2find$5") \
        .option("driver", "com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.SQLServerDriver") \
        .option("forwardSparkAzureStorageCredentials", "true") \
        .mode("overwrite") \
        .save()

df.write.mode("overwrite") \
    .format("jdbc") \
    .option("url", f"jdbc:sqlserver://localhost:1433;databaseName={database};") \
    .option("dbtable", table) \
    .option("user", user) \
    .option("password", password) \
    .option("driver", "com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.SQLServerDriver") \
    .save()
